doctor.name: Dr. Md. Sumon Rana
doctor.specialty: Neurosurgery (Brain, Nerve, Spine, Vascular, Stroke) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Sumon Rana is a Neurosurgeon in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (Neurosurgery). He is working as a Neurosurgery (Brain, Nerve, Spine, Vascular, Stroke) Specialist doctor in Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at City Diagnostic Center, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Sumon Rana at City Diagnostic Center, Pabna is 8am to 4pm (Every Friday).

chamber.address: Beside TB Hospital, Hospital Road, Shalgaria, Pabna
